a1: I wish they did better in the World Cup.
q2: Will Argentina improve by the next World Cup?
q3: I think they should improve if they want to win a world cup
q4: They will need to replace the aging Messi or find him more support if he is still playing.
a4: They have to find more support for Messi
q5: Yeah he's like Michael Jordan of basketball in the 80's - do it all.
a5: And I can't wait to see more of him
